content: this legal text describes the resolution of a court case involving the division of a property located in torano castello the property includes a craft workshop and a civil dwelling the court assigned ownership shares to the parties involved including heirs and a spouse the defendants were ordered to pay the costs of the proceedings the court conducted a preliminary investigation to determine the value of the property and rental income an expert prepared a report detailing the propertys value and the shares due to each party the court also addressed the payment of rents and management of the deceaseds bank account it found that the heirs had not properly accounted for the rents and ordered them to pay the remaining balance the court ordered the distribution of shares and the allocation of shares to a noninterestbearing account the defendants were instructed to pay the remaining balance and the costs of the proceedings overall this legal document outlines the progress of the case including the division of assets and the financial responsibilities of the parties involved
